#include<iostream>
#include<algorithm>
using namespace std;
    int TotalTime(int band[], int n)
    {
        
        if (n < 3)
        {
            return band[n - 1];
        }
        else if (n == 3)
        {
            return band[0] + band[1] + band[2];
        }
        else
        {
            int temp1 = band[n - 1] + band[0] + band[n - 2] + band[0];
            int temp2 = band[1] + band[0] + band[n - 1] + band[1];
 
            if (temp1 < temp2)
            {
                return temp1 + TotalTime(band, n - 2);
            }
            else if (temp2 < temp1)
            {
                return temp2 + TotalTime(band, n - 2);
            }
            else
            {
                return temp2 + TotalTime(band, n - 2);
            }
        }
    }
    int main()
    {
        int n;
        cin>>n;
        int band[n];
        for(int i=0;i<n;i++)
            cin>>band[i];
        sort(band,band+n);
        int t=TotalTime(band,n);
        cout<<t<<endl;
        return 0;
    }
